body:
Hey all, it's Wednesday (somewhere).

Today we are releasing a new module which could be used to bring back some nostalgic behaviors to some maps. This module is simply called the Shops Module and can be used to create in game shops.

The shops look like this:


and can be configured via XML. We are planning to add more possible item types in the future.

You can read the full documentation here.

Kord will be handling the Friday update, so I will see you next Wednesday.
ALM
